game keeps crashing after the logo. every version. is there a fix ??

for those with a black screen after logo:
i had same problem, heres how to fix...
start game, right when rebellion logo comes up, hit
ALT-ENTER, to make a window, then game will continue to load, once u get to main menu, u can hit alt-enter again to go back to full screen.  
i have to do this just about everytime to get it to come up.... good luck!

@FieroGT
You are a pure genius dude!! LOL you outsmarted the system man! Thanks to you, you saved me from hell of searching to get this issue fixed! U da man bro ;)

Installation Guide:
1.Download a fresh version of uTorrent 
2.Download the game torrent
3.Go to uTorrent - Prefrences - Bandwidth - Set Global maximum number of connection to - 500
Maximum number of connected peers per torrent - 300
Number of upload slots per torrent:10
the Click bittorrent - Protocol Encyption - Outgoing:Forced
4:Download and install Microsoft visual C++ (x86) and (x64) both versions
5:Download and install NetFrame Work
6:Keep updated you graphic's card driver
7:Install the game and run as administrator you can also run all game's by folowing these step's

Had to register to advise those with "crash after logo" issue to give this a shot.
Go to nvidia control panel and under 'manage 3D settings', add the sniper nazi zombie .exe file to the list and change the settings from 'use global setting' to 'high performance nvidia processor'. Worked for me so good luck!
